attributes.action: ban the use of gas-powered ornamental flames/torches outside buildings
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Given that the government is considering banning patio heaters then surely the gas powered flames / torches features commonly found outside restaurants, bars, clubs and hotels should be banned also.

The gas combustion increases CO2, atmospheric pollution and uses up a rapidly diminishing, finite fossil fuel for what is completly ornamental/vanity reasons and makes a mockery of the nation's attempt to reduce C02 emmissions.
